name: Ali Baba (Hebdogiciel)
overview: After multiple adventures, you managed to enter the cave of ALI BABA, with the intention of bringing back some 'memories' ... Unfortunately, the genie spots you and tries to lock you up by blocking the corridors with his magical fluid, which in seconds turns into the hardest stone, unless you destroy it beforehand. You can come out of the cave only by taking all the treasure. You will then have to face a more powerful genie: indeed, its walls solidify more quickly. Each time a new wall is built, your score decreases by 100 points. The goal of the game is to hold as long as possible, before the score is zero. Published in Hebdogiciel N°027 (13.04.1984). 40 bonus points per table Additional dependent bonus The time taken to take the last 20 to 30 ATTENTION: this last bonus can be negative. If you want to go to the next table without finishing, type _. In this case, all will turn into walls ... Pressing the spacebar, the game stops until you press a key."
